Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; genealogy of the Hammurapi dynasty; list the names of the kings of Babylon down to Ammiditana, preceded by several Amorite tribal ancestors, to whose spirits offerings of food and drink were made; check marks; 17 + 4 + 19 + 3
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.225)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2008 26 Jun-5 Oct, Berlin, Vorderasiatisches Museum-Pergamonmuseum, 'Babylon, Myth and Truth' 2008 14 Mar-2 Jun, Paris, Musée du Louvre, 'Babylon'
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
